title: Reconfigurable Systolic Array AI Accelerator
summary: RTL Design, prototyping, and verification of a 16x16 systolic array AI accelerator, with reconfigurable SIMD and output-stationary modes for maximum flexibility.

title: Croc
summary: PULP Platform SoC with modified RV32 CPU core incorporating a faster multiplier/adder datapath, and formal verification of critical APB components.

title: PRF Generation using GGM Tree Construction
summary: Pseudorandom Function (PRF) Generation using GGM Tree Construction on AES and Blake2S hash functions. Parallelized using CUDA.
